titleStmt.title: An advertisement of Mr. Boyle, about the loss of many of his writings address'd to Mr. J.W. to be communicated to those friends of his, that are virtuosi, which may serve as a kind of preface to most of his mutilated and unfinish'd writings.
titleStmt.author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
